```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Load libraries
library(showtext)  #Needed to use the Oswald font in the plots
library(tidyverse)
library(dscstyle)
library(knitr)

# Load the Oswald font
font_add_google("Oswald", "Oswald")


## Global chunk options
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  
  fig.width = 6, 
  fig.height = 6,
  fig.align = 'center',
  fig.showtext = TRUE, 
  out.width = "100%"
  )

## Global R options
options(
  scipen = 5
  )
```
